about_the_game: Long ago, all creatures of the pixel world lived together in harmony. Then everything changed when the Egghead mafia attacked. And there is only one can stop them and save the pixel world - Golf Assassin. But the Egghead mafia never sleeps. You will have to face many creative traps and devices designed to thwart you, from spikes to mecha suits.

short_description: Golf Assassin is a 2D black and white pixel minigolf platformer. Test your accuracy and reaction to avoid the traps and "break" the Egghead mafia once and for all.
